casebody.data:
Miglena ANGEL, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. The BOEING COMPANY RETIREE HEALTH AND WELFARE BENEFIT PLAN, Defendant-Appellee. No. 06-10540. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. May 29, 2007. Kent W. Starr, Dallas, TX, for Plaintiff-Appellant. Douglas Kent Butler, Figari, Davenport & Graves, Dallas, TX, for Defendant-Appellee.

Before GARWOOD, SMITH and DEMOSS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM: *

Having considered the oral argument of counsel, the briefs of the parties, and the pertinent portions of the record, we affirm the judgment of the district court essentially for the reasons stated in its April 11, 2006 memorandum opinion.

AFFIRMED.

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5 the Court has determined that this opinion should not be published and is not precedent except under the limited circumstances set forth in 5th Cir. R. 47.5.4.
